verses.verse: And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> wherein his father <S%H1><s%> was a stranger, <S%H4033><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> being seventeen <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> feeding <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his brethren; <S%H251><s%> and the lad <S%H5288><s%> was with <S%H854><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah, <S%H1090><s%> and with <S%H854><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah, <S%H2153><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> wives: <S%H802><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> their <S%H853><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> report. <S%H1681><s%>

Now Israel <S%H3478><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> more than all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> his children, <S%H1121><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was the son <S%H1121><s%> of his old age: <S%H2208><s%> and he made <S%H6213><s%> him a coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colors. <S%H6446><s%>

And when his brethren <S%H251><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> him more than all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> they hated <S%H8130><s%> him, and could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> peaceably <S%H7965><s%> unto him.

And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream, <S%H2472><s%> and he told <S%H5046><s%> it his brethren: <S%H251><s%> and they hated <S%H8130><s%> him yet <S%H5750><s%> the more. <S%H3254><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Hear, <S%H8085><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> dream <S%H2472><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have dreamed: <S%H2492><s%>

For, behold, <S%H2009><s%> we <S%H587><s%> were binding <S%H481><s%> sheaves <S%H485><s%> in <S%H8432><s%> the field, <S%H7704><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> my sheaf <S%H485><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and also <S%H1571><s%> stood upright; <S%H5324><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> your sheaves <S%H485><s%> stood round about, <S%H5437><s%> and made obeisance <S%H7812><s%> to my sheaf. <S%H485><s%>

And his brethren <S%H251><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Shalt thou indeed reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us? or <S%H518><s%> shalt thou indeed have dominion <S%H4910><s%> <S%H4910><s%> over us? And they hated <S%H8130><s%> him yet <S%H5750><s%> the more <S%H3254><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> his dreams, <S%H2472><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> his words. <S%H1697><s%>

And he dreamed <S%H2492><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> another <S%H312><s%> dream, <S%H2472><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> it his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> more; <S%H5750><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the eleven <S%H259><s%> <S%H6240><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> made obeisance <S%H7812><s%> to me.

And he told <S%H5608><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his brethren: <S%H251><s%> and his father <S%H1><s%> rebuked <S%H1605><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him, What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> dream <S%H2472><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou hast dreamed? <S%H2492><s%> Shall I <S%H589><s%> and thy mother <S%H517><s%> and thy brethren <S%H251><s%> indeed come <S%H935><s%> <S%H935><s%> to bow down ourselves <S%H7812><s%> to thee to the earth? <S%H776><s%>
And his brethren <S%H251><s%> envied <S%H7065><s%> him; but his father <S%H1><s%> observed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> the saying. <S%H1697><s%>
And his brethren <S%H251><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H853><s%> their father's <S%H1><s%> flock <S%H6629><s%> in Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Do not <S%H3808><s%> thy brethren <S%H251><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> the flock in Shechem? <S%H7927><s%> come, <S%H1980><s%> and I will send <S%H7971><s%> thee unto <S%H413><s%> them. And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, Here <S%H2009><s%> am I.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, Go, <S%H1980><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> whether <S%H853><s%> it be well <S%H7965><s%> with thy brethren, <S%H251><s%> and well <S%H7965><s%> with the flocks; <S%H6629><s%> and bring <S%H7725><s%> me word <S%H1697><s%> again. So he sent <S%H7971><s%> him out of the vale <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6010><s%> of Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and he came <S%H935><s%> to Shechem. <S%H7927><s%>

And a certain man <S%H376><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> him, and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> he was wandering <S%H8582><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> and the man <S%H376><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> seekest <S%H1245><s%> thou?

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I <S%H595><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> my brethren: <S%H251><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me, I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> where <S%H375><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> their flocks.

And the man <S%H376><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> They are departed <S%H5265><s%> hence; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I heard <S%H8085><s%> them say, <S%H559><s%> Let us go <S%H1980><s%> to Dothan. <S%H1886><s%> And Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and found <S%H4672><s%> them in Dothan. <S%H1886><s%>

And when they saw <S%H7200><s%> him afar off, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7350><s%> even before <S%H2962><s%> he came near <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, they conspired <S%H5230><s%> against him to slay <S%H4191><s%> him.
And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to <S%H413><s%> another, <S%H251><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H1976><s%> dreamer <S%H1167><s%> <S%H2472><s%> cometh. <S%H935><s%>

Come <S%H1980><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, and let us slay <S%H2026><s%> him, and cast <S%H7993><s%> him into some <S%H259><s%> pit, <S%H953><s%> and we will say, <S%H559><s%> Some evil <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> him: and we shall see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> will become <S%H1961><s%> of his dreams. <S%H2472><s%>

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> it, and he delivered <S%H5337><s%> him out of their hands; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Let us not <S%H3808><s%> kill <S%H5221><s%> him.

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Shed <S%H8210><s%> no <S%H408><s%> blood, <S%H1818><s%> but cast <S%H7993><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> pit <S%H953><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and lay <S%H7971><s%> no <S%H408><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> upon him; that <S%H4616><s%> he might rid <S%H5337><s%> him out of their hands, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to deliver <S%H7725><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> again.

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H834><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> that they stripped <S%H6584><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> out of <S%H853><s%> his coat, <S%H3801><s%> his <S%H853><s%> coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colors <S%H6446><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was on <S%H5921><s%> him;
And they took <S%H3947><s%> him, and cast <S%H7993><s%> him into a pit: <S%H953><s%> and the pit <S%H953><s%> was empty, <S%H7386><s%> there was no <S%H369><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> in it.

And they sat down <S%H3427><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> bread: <S%H3899><s%> and they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> a company <S%H736><s%> of Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from Gilead <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1568><s%> with their camels <S%H1581><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> spicery <S%H5219><s%> and balm <S%H6875><s%> and myrrh, <S%H3910><s%> going <S%H1980><s%> to carry it down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> profit <S%H1215><s%> is it if <S%H3588><s%> we slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H853><s%> our brother, <S%H251><s%> and conceal <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> his blood? <S%H1818><s%>

Come, <S%H1980><s%> and let us sell <S%H4376><s%> him to the Ishmaelites, <S%H3459><s%> and let not <S%H408><s%> our hand <S%H3027><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> upon him; for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is our brother <S%H251><s%> and our flesh. <S%H1320><s%> And his brethren <S%H251><s%> were content. <S%H8085><s%>

Then there passed by <S%H5674><s%> Midianites <S%H376><s%> <S%H4084><s%> merchantmen; <S%H5503><s%> and they drew <S%H4900><s%> and lifted up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the pit, <S%H953><s%> and sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> to the Ishmaelites <S%H3459><s%> for twenty <S%H6242><s%> pieces of silver: <S%H3701><s%> and they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> into Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Reuben <S%H7205><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the pit; <S%H953><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was not <S%H369><s%> in the pit; <S%H953><s%> and he rent <S%H7167><s%> <S%H853><s%> his clothes. <S%H899><s%>

And he returned <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his brethren, <S%H251><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> The child <S%H3206><s%> is not; <S%H369><s%> and I, <S%H589><s%> whither <S%H575><s%> shall I <S%H589><s%> go? <S%H935><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joseph's <S%H3130><s%> coat, <S%H3801><s%> and killed <S%H7819><s%> a kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats, <S%H5795><s%> and dipped <S%H2881><s%> <S%H853><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> in the blood; <S%H1818><s%>

And they sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colors, <S%H6446><s%> and they brought <S%H935><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> their father; <S%H1><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> have we found: <S%H4672><s%> know <S%H5234><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> whether it <S%H1931><s%> be thy son's <S%H1121><s%> coat <S%H3801><s%> or <S%H518><s%> no. <S%H3808><s%>

And he knew <S%H5234><s%> it, and said, <S%H559><s%> It is my son's <S%H1121><s%> coat; <S%H3801><s%> an evil <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> him; Joseph <S%H3130><s%> is without doubt rent in pieces. <S%H2963><s%> <S%H2963><s%>

And Jacob <S%H3290><s%> rent <S%H7167><s%> his clothes, <S%H8071><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> upon his loins, <S%H4975><s%> and mourned <S%H56><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his daughters <S%H1323><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> to comfort <S%H5162><s%> him; but he refused <S%H3985><s%> to be comforted; <S%H5162><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> I will go down <S%H3381><s%> into the grave <S%H7585><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> mourning. <S%H57><s%> Thus his father <S%H1><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> for him.

And the Midianites <S%H4092><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Potiphar, <S%H6318><s%> an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh's, <S%H6547><s%> and captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard. <S%H2876><s%>
